CONFIG.ua: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/130.0.0.0 Safari/537.36 Edg/130.0.0.0

values: 深的；深远的；深刻的；深色的；浓重的；剧烈的；极度的；深思熟虑的；深度的；渊博的；深（呼吸）的；酣睡的；远至…的；成…排的；靠近对方端线的
深处；深海；深渊；深层区域
深深地；深刻地；深入地；彻底地；深远地

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 使深化；加深（deepen的现在分词）

word_mean_info__list.difference: 语气较强，较为庄重，多指抽象的事物，多用于比喻。
普通用词，指由上到下，或由表及里的深度，可指具体或抽象事物。

word_group.brief_definition: 美貌不过一层皮(指人品比外表更重要)

bilingual.source: The temple has a long deep crack.
bilingual.target: 这座庙有一道很深的裂缝。
我们之间有很深的血缘关系。
这首歌表述了深深的爱意。

bilingual.source: She has a deep emotion for art.
bilingual.target: 她对艺术有很深的感情。

bilingual.source: She has a deep scar on her arm.
bilingual.target: 她的手臂上有一道深深的瘢痕。
这首歌表达了深深的伤痛。
我们之间有很深的家庭关系。

bilingual.source: There are deep lines on her palm.
bilingual.target: 她的手掌上有深深的纹路。

bilingual.source: He left a deep mark on the paper.
bilingual.target: 他在纸上留下了一道深深的痕迹。

bilingual.source: He has a deep study of feng shui.
bilingual.target: 他对风水有很深的研究。

list.abstract: DEEP是日本的4人组合，R&B的合唱团体。这是一支以之前“探索者”Chirs Curtis（鼓手）为中心的乐队，当时名叫“迂回”（Roundabout）。隶属于LDH事务所。所属的唱片公司为AVEX。2004年、作为EXILE各成员的个人企划的一环，ATSUSHI产生了“想要通过更具音乐性的东西来传达讯息”这种想法。于是，以此为契机开辟了以黑人音乐为中心的自我音乐道路，并决定成立了组合。

yingyinNormal.en: What? Too deep is a ladle, not a spoon.
yingyinNormal.zh: 干嘛？深的是勺子，不是汤匙。

yingyinNormal.en: That's very kind of you, Daddy Pig. Now, be careful, it's a very deep hole.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你这么做真是太好了，猪爸爸。现在，小心一点，这是个非常深的洞。

yingyinNormal.en: That's very kind of you, Daddy Pig. Now, be careful, it's a very deep hole.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你可真是太好了，猪爸爸，千万要小心，这个坑很深的。

yingyinNormal.en: There's the road. On the other side of this deep, dark, dangerous, hazardous…
yingyinNormal.zh: 路在那儿。在另外一边，过了这个深的，黑的，危险的，有害的……

yingyinNormal.en: Daddy pig is here to do some work. That's very kind of you, Daddy Pig. Now, be careful, it's a very deep hole.
yingyinNormal.zh: 猪爸爸，他是来干活的。你可真是太好了，猪爸爸，千万要小心，这个坑很深的。

yingyinNormal.en: You have a deep sense of duty, like all the men and women here who served their country, and that's far more important to me than strategy.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你有很深的责任感，就像这里埋葬的所有为国捐躯的男男女女，这对我来说比策略重要多了。

yingyinNormal.en: A well, Peppa, is a very deep hole with water in it. Woo. And as it happens, I do need water for my garden. So a well will be useful. But that is not a well.
yingyinNormal.zh: 一口井，佩奇，井就是非常深的洞，而且里面还有水。哦！既然已将送来啊了，我的花园确实需要水。而且有一口井还是挺有用的，但是有个应该不是一口真正的井。

yingyinNormal.en: Deep breath, deep breath, deep breath!
yingyinNormal.zh: 深呼吸深呼吸...

yingyinNormal.en: How deep does this fucking thing go? Deep enough.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这他妈究竟有多深？非常深。

yingyinNormal.en: Deep, deep space gives you a very, very fresh approach.
yingyinNormal.zh: 深邃的宇宙空间给了你非常非常新鲜的方法。

yingyinNormal.en: For me, it is a deep, personal loss.
yingyinNormal.zh: 对我来说，这是一个极大的个人损失。

yingyinNormal.en: She fell down, down, down, deep in a hole.
yingyinNormal.zh: 她一直往下掉呀掉，掉到一个洞里了。

yingyinNormal.en: That, is deep. Told you. What can we do now?
yingyinNormal.zh: 排水道真深啊！我就说吧！我们现在该怎么办？

yingyinNormal.en: You shouldn't be this deep in the forest alone.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你不该一个人跑进树林深处的。

yingyinNormal.en: I dozed off. You breathe so deep when you sleep.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我刚刚睡着了。你睡觉的时候呼吸很沉。

yingyinNormal.en: And deep down, Maya is beautiful. Okay, calm down.
yingyinNormal.zh: 而事实上，玛雅很美。好了，冷静一下。

yingyinNormal.en: Alright, Mommies, take a nice deep cleansing breath.
yingyinNormal.zh: 各位妈妈们，请深呼吸。

yingyinNormal.en: I'm here to argue today that beauty actually is skin deep.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我今天的论点是美的确仅存于外表。

yingyinNormal.en: Deep breath, Gaston. Deep breath. So why don't we just turn around, go back to Villeneuve? I'm sure Belle is at home, cooking up a lovely dinner.
yingyinNormal.zh: 冷静，加斯顿。深呼吸。那么我们为什么不转过身去，回到维伦纽夫呢？我肯定贝儿在家，做了一顿丰盛的晚餐。

yingyinNormal.en: The great gate. Deep in ground and through magic brought us here.
yingyinNormal.zh: 黑暗之门，在地层深处，通过魔法把我们带到这儿来。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 深度；深奥；深刻；深处；纵深；纵深感；渗透（或渗漏）深度；下降深度；下达深度；立体感

word_family.mean: adj. 深的；剧烈的；极度的；深沉的；深色的；深刻的；幽深的；深奥的；深陷的；纵深的

sense_info_list.en: extending far down from the top or surface; extending or situated far in or down from the outer edge or surface
(of an emotion or feeling) intensely felt

examination_example.sentence: Humans also seem to have a <highlight>deep</highlight> desire to belong.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 人类似乎也有强烈的归属感。

examination_example.sentence: It is our <highlight>deep</highlight> destiny.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这是我们的命运。

sense_info_list.en: difficult to understand; profound or penetrating in awareness or understanding

examination_example.sentence: Meanwhile, it works best in conjunction with <highlight>deep</highlight> knowledge and expertise.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 同时，它与深厚的知识和专业技能相结合，效果最好。

sense_info_list.en: taking in or giving out a lot of air slow and steady
fully absorbed or involved in a state or activity

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 美貌不过一层皮(指人品比外表更重要)

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 深度；深奥；深刻；深处；纵深；纵深感；渗透（或渗漏）深度；下降深度；下达深度；立体感

word_family.mean: adj. 深的；剧烈的；极度的；深沉的；深色的；深刻的；幽深的；深奥的；深陷的；纵深的

sense_info_list.en: extending far down from the top or surface; extending or situated far in or down from the outer edge or surface

examination_example.sentence: Rather than having real-life conversations, many express emotions and engage in <highlight>deep</highlight> conversations through social media sites.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 许多人不进行现实生活中的对话，而是通过社交媒体网站表达情感，进行深入的对话。

examination_example.sentence: To illustrate her point that beauty is but skin <highlight>deep</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 为了阐明她的观点，美丽只是肤浅的。

sense_info_list.en: difficult to understand; profound or penetrating in awareness or understanding

examination_example.sentence: Most of them are not reading long articles or books that explore <highlight>deep</highlight> themes and require critical thinking and reflection.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们中的大多数人不是在阅读探索深层主题、需要批判性思维和反思的长篇文章或书籍。

examination_example.sentence: But potential employers might worry that, that experience is not <highlight>deep</highlight>, or thorough enough.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但潜在雇主可能会担心，这种经历不够深刻，或者不够彻底。

sense_info_list.en: fully absorbed or involved in a state or activity

examination_example.sentence: Thus, <highlight>deep</highlight> reading is crucial for being a good citizen, a successful college student and a productive employee.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 因此，深度阅读对于成为一个好公民、一个成功的大学生和一个有生产力的雇员是至关重要的。

sense_info_list.en: (of an emotion or feeling) intensely felt

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 深度；深奥；深刻；深处；纵深；纵深感；渗透（或渗漏）深度；下降深度；下达深度；立体感

word_family.mean: adj. 深的；剧烈的；极度的；深沉的；深色的；深刻的；幽深的；深奥的；深陷的；纵深的

examination_example.sentence: But it was the effects <highlight>deep</highlight> within the fat cells that may have been the most significant, the researchers found.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但是研究人员发现，在脂肪细胞深处的影响可能是最重要的。

examination_example.sentence: We used to think that insects were the smallest organisms (生物), and that nothing lived <highlight>deeper</highlight> than six hundred meters.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们过去认为昆虫是最小的生物，而且没有什么会生活在地面600米以下。

examination_example.sentence: They went farther north into the <highlight>deep</highlight> forests of Canada, where there were fewer humans around.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们向北走到加拿大的深山老林中，那里的人类较少。

examination_example.sentence: He has a <highlight>deep</highlight> love for the theater.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他对戏剧有着深深的热爱。

examination_example.sentence: Together, these <highlight>deep</highlight> human urges (驱策力) count for much more that ambition.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这些深刻的人类冲动加在一起，比野心要重要得多。

examination_example.sentence: Dismissing small talk as unimportant is easy, but we can't forget that <highlight>deep</highlight> relationships wouldn't even exist if it weren't for casual conversation.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 嫌弃闲聊不重要很容易，但我们不能忘记，如果没有闲聊，深刻的关系甚至不会存在。

examination_example.sentence: That relief is coupled with a <highlight>deep</highlight> understanding of why the same people keep coming back for more.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这种解脱与对为什么同样的人不断回来索取的深刻理解相辅相成。

examination_example.sentence: For weeks, I've been thinking of bigger, <highlight>deeper</highlight> questions: How do we make it a habit for them?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 几周来，我一直在思考更大、更深的问题：我们如何使之成为他们的习惯？

examination_example.sentence: Wang's works show a <highlight>deep</highlight> understanding of modern architecture and a good knowledge of traditions.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 王的作品体现了对现代建筑的深刻理解和对传统的深刻认识。

examination_example.sentence: I climbed to the top of a small rise and realised that the mist was little more than a few feet <highlight>deep</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我爬到了一个小山的山顶，发现这里的薄雾仅有几英尺深。

examination_example.sentence: To construct a working still, use a sharp stick or rock to dig a hole four feet across and three feet <highlight>deep</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 要建造蒸馏器，用锋利的棍子或石块挖一个四英尺宽、三英尺深的洞。

examination_example.sentence: The <highlight>deep</highlight>, gentle voice helped calm the nervous girl.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这个低沉、温和的声音有助于安抚这个紧张的女孩。

examination_example.sentence: forcing patients into a state of <highlight>deep</highlight> sleep
examination_example.sentence_trans: 强迫病人进入深度睡眠状态

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 深度；深奥；深刻；深处；纵深；纵深感；渗透（或渗漏）深度；下降深度；下达深度；立体感

word_family.mean: adj. 深的；剧烈的；极度的；深沉的；深色的；深刻的；幽深的；深奥的；深陷的；纵深的

examination_example.sentence: To express her <highlight>deep</highlight> regret.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 表达她深深的遗憾。

examination_example.sentence: I held the flower up to my nose and took a <highlight>deep</highlight> breath.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我把花举到鼻子前，深吸了一口气。

examination_example.sentence: The home of the elephant is in the <highlight>deep</highlight> forest.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 大象的家在森林深处。

examination_example.sentence: If you love to be in the water and dive <highlight>deep</highlight>, you need this!
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果你喜欢潜入水深处，你需要这个！
